timeline.bodyText: it slightly overlaps with line 56 check
timeline.author: timofei-durakov

replies.bodyText:
We can't remove check in line 57 because it will cause NPE in line 60.
Also we can't remove default section because:

stylecheck will raise a warning
YesNo enum has other values like UNRECOGNIZED and YESNO_RESERVED. We must handle them
replies.author: niksv

timeline.bodyText: why all of these are wrappers, not primitives?
timeline.author: timofei-durakov

replies.bodyText: fixed, except Boolean field because it can be null in some cases
replies.author: niksv
